entry.title: venv, pyenv, pypi, pip, pipenv, pyWTF?
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker: Simone Robutti

The ecosystem of Python tooling is fragmented, confusing, full of quirks and therefore hostile to newcomers and veterans alike. Let's try to make sense of it.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference. https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/HQJMTL Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin, https://twitter.com/pyconde
